projectDescription: TrillionX Coin (XTRN) is a next-generation digital asset developed on the Ecrox Chain Blockchain. It integrates innovative tokenomics with sector-based taxation to support development, marketing, ecosystem rewards, and burn mechanisms. Designed for scalability and utility, TrillionX Coin is revolutionizing the future of decentralized finance and token-driven ecosystems with zero gas fees on Ecrox Chain.
